Text:
Can anyone tell me how to look at the DVD. In the folder all files are .flac
No player recognice .flac
Is there any mistake by me downloading?
Shall I convert the files somehow?

This is not a dvd. It's a audio bootleg from the concert. FLAC is just a codec (instead of mp3, ogg etc.). To be able to play FLAC, read here:
http://flac.sourceforge.net/
